title: Coronavirus: House passes $2trn stimulus package
description: The House sent to Donald Trump's desk a $2trn economic aid package meant to help out-of-work Americans and businesses as Washington is rushing to stave off economic calamity amid the virus outbreak. The president says he will sign it into law soon.
